snippet: Liz Alderman provides an inside look at her reporting on an article about the controversy surrounding the ortolan, a tiny songbird that gourmands in France once coveted.
abstract: Liz Alderman provides an inside look at her reporting on an article about the controversy surrounding the ortolan, a tiny songbird that gourmands in France once coveted.

headline.main: The Songbird French Chefs Love to Eat: Reporter's Notebook
